channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 175b81b9-6e0d-490a-85e4-0d422273c10c
Display name: App Configuration Reader
Description: Grants permission for read operations for App Configuration resources.
Link: https://management.azure.com/175b81b9-6e0d-490a-85e4-0d422273c10c?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: fe86443c-f201-4fc4-9d2a-ac61149fbda0
Display name: App Configuration Contributor
Description: Grants permission for all management operations, except purge, for App Configuration resources.
Link: https://management.azure.com/fe86443c-f201-4fc4-9d2a-ac61149fbda0?api-version=2022-04-01
